channel.title: Lilwermscape v3 come join more pics will be added
channel.description:
Membership: Mains: You must reach 100 combat first. After you have that, talk to the Lumbridge guide South of the shops at home. You can receive membership from him.
Skillers and pures: You must first get at least one level 99 skill. You will prove it by wearing the skillcape. After that is obtained, speak with a staff member about membership.
Features: Here are some of the features:
Minigames: - Battle Grounds (Castle Wars remodeled) - Check forums for Battle Grounds Fridays - Duel Arena (Close to full) - Pest Control - GWD - Different Bosses - Fight Pits - Fight Caves (7 Waves) - Assault - Barrows - More to come for members
Skillcape Emotes! - Dragon Claw Special (Real Animation) - Godsword Stances and Specials (Real Animations) - Clan Chat (Fully functional) - Skilling (Fully functional) - Pking (Of course) - Double exp weekends (On certain occasions) - Currently 1500 exp rate (Changing to make it work well with extended level cap) - Holiday Events (RARES!!!) - Great economy (Will try hard not to screw it up) - Dice game gambling from NPC (55x2... 100k, 500k, 1m) <--- need to re-add it - Dice game gambling from clan chat ("/roll" rolls a random number from 1-100) - Fully working slayer (Talk to Vannaka for tasks) - Steel dragons made easy to kill for training (Also with good drops) - Rock crab training - Island training (Includes slayer monsters) - Drop parties for a certain amount of votes - And loads more...
Dragon claws - Dragon platebody - Metal whips (Bronze - Dragon) - Abby whip (Strong) - PVP Armors (Distributed in Battle Grounds point shop) - Elegant armor (Expensive armor for skillers) - DFS (Pretty good effect) - Noob crystal (Resets your skills) - Bank crystal (To open your bank) - And loads more...
Come join us! http://lilwermscape.org/ download = http://uppit.com/v7l3771hdime/LilwermScape_Client.rar webclient = http://lilwermscape.org/play/
[img][/img]

item.title: Lilwermscape v3 come join more pics will be added
item.dc:creator: @flowofhope flowofhope
item.description:
@flowofhope wrote:

Membership:
Mains: You must reach 100 combat first. After you have that, talk to the Lumbridge guide South of the shops at home. You can receive membership from him.

Skillers and pures: You must first get at least one level 99 skill. You will prove it by wearing the skillcape. After that is obtained, speak with a staff member about membership.

Features:
Here are some of the features:

Minigames:

  • Battle Grounds (Castle Wars remodeled) - Check forums for Battle Grounds Fridays
  • Duel Arena (Close to full)
  • Pest Control
  • GWD
  • Different Bosses
  • Fight Pits
  • Fight Caves (7 Waves)
  • Assault
  • Barrows
  • More to come for members

Skillcape Emotes!

  • Dragon Claw Special (Real Animation)
  • Godsword Stances and Specials (Real Animations)
  • Clan Chat (Fully functional)
  • Skilling (Fully functional)
  • Pking (Of course)
  • Double exp weekends (On certain occasions)
  • Currently 1500 exp rate (Changing to make it work well with extended level cap)
  • Holiday Events (RARES!!!)
  • Great economy (Will try hard not to screw it up)
  • Dice game gambling from NPC (55x2… 100k, 500k, 1m) <— need to re-add it
  • Dice game gambling from clan chat ("/roll" rolls a random number from 1-100)
  • Fully working slayer (Talk to Vannaka for tasks)
  • Steel dragons made easy to kill for training (Also with good drops)
  • Rock crab training
  • Island training (Includes slayer monsters)
  • Drop parties for a certain amount of votes
  • And loads more…

Dragon claws

  • Dragon platebody
  • Metal whips (Bronze - Dragon)
  • Abby whip (Strong)
  • PVP Armors (Distributed in Battle Grounds point shop)
  • Elegant armor (Expensive armor for skillers)
  • DFS (Pretty good effect)
  • Noob crystal (Resets your skills)
  • Bank crystal (To open your bank)
  • And loads more…

Come join us!
http://lilwermscape.org/
